title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Dancing man, dressed in white pantelettes, yellow skirt, white and manganese overshirt, and wearing pointed blue, brimless hat. Chinoiserie type of decoration .

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-22.
